Throughout this game, I've strived to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've built genuine connections with each of you, navigating challenging decisions with integrity. I've never targeted anyone out of spite, only making tough choices when necessary for survival.

I respect P7 as a worthy opponent, but I hope you've seen my consistent approach to building trust and alliances. I've listened carefully, responded thoughtfully, and played with both heart and mind.

I would be honored to have your vote, and regardless of outcome, I'm grateful for this experience with all of you.
